text:
Coffeeville is a town in Clarke County, Alabama, United States. At the 2010 census, the population was 352. The town was incorporated in 1817.
Geography.
Coffeeville is located at 31°45'40.543" North, 88°5'20.940" West (31.761262, -88.089150), on high ground on the east side of the Tombigbee River.
According to the U.S. Census Bureau, the town has a total area of, all land.
